mistral:7b-instruct: This St Luke's Health EPO plan fits your profile due to its comprehensive coverage for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care, which are crucial for managing your multiple health conditions (hypertension, diabetes, heart disease, etc.). The $300 monthly premium is reasonable for an upper-middle income bracket, while the $500,000 coverage and $6,500 Max Out-of-Pocket limit offer substantial financial protection against high medical bills. Keep in mind that cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments are excluded from this plan.
